nodes.text: In 3.5 ABY, a Rodian criminal and a partner attempted to kidnap from the Stone Grotto dinner club on the planet Bothawui a courier representing a rival crime syndicate. The courier was in possession of a briefcase containing certain contents that the Rodians' syndicate coveted. The Rodian was armed with a stun gun and a thermal detonator and threatened to blow the entire establishment to bits when a group of Alliance Intelligence operatives intervened.
The Rodian kidnappers were ultimately apprehended by local Bothan police and were pinned with the murder of another Rodian involved in the intrigue.
The adventure offers the possibility that the players can disarm the Rodian with the thermal detonator if they act quickly, otherwise they will face a messy hostage situation.
